Changelog
=========

## x.y.z - UNRELEASED

--------

## 0.2.0 - 2015-05-20

### Added

* [TextToSpeech] getFile() method to cache webservice calls.
* [TextToSpeech] save() method to store the audio on the local filesystem.

--------

## 0.1.0 - 2015-05-19

### Added

* [Providers] Google provider.
* [Providers] Voxygen provider.
* [Providers] Voice RSS provider.
